title.narrative: Vocational training for young people and school tutoring for children in poor settlements

description.narrative: The aim of the project is to give a chance for a better quality of life for children and young living in extreme poverty in settlements. Schoolchildren get tutoring and help to achieve a better performance in school they are taught group work and interacti on skills and enabled an integral development by letting them pursue their right to play and be children. The young get vocational training in courses that also contain work life and interaction skills training besides learning the occupation in practice. The possibilities of young people from settlement areas to get decent work are many times very low because of the poverty and them being without formal education. The purpose is to through formal work bring the young from the edge of society into it as ful l members and enhance their and their families? socio-economic position and quality of life and promote equality and equal opportunities for all. The activities directed for children will be carried out in 8 different settlements in Montevideo and the voca tional training for young will be organized in 6 courses in Montevideo and two in the cities of Salto and Paysandu.
